column2: "A thousand soldiers embracing this battle in their open arms"

"Is this a curse
Or is this nightmare the cost to find their freedom?"

"The dreaded beasts see you tremble
Whispering as they try to convince you:"

"\"Give up, you fool
Your time has come in this battle\""

"Forge the flames of your fractured heart
Even though all this life is hopelessly shattered"

"Fan the embers until they glow
Born in you is a warrior"

"Never hesistate
Fight endlessly against your fate!"

"Your light blesses us all
You shine like beacon in our souls, my fiery friend"

"I see the fire in your bright, humble eyes
Rise up again and again"

"Oh fate, those who believe in bonds with the ones who carry us on
Please lead them our way"

"The tears and love we share never end
We shine like stars in the night eternally"

"The words that could not be spoken
Are broken as they return to the earth"

"Wait for the world we dreamed of
'Til it is time to reach and claim it"

"Our endless longing we cling to
Will one day burn away into ashes"

"We'll soldier on
This battle is not decided"

"Weave this world with your brilliance
Radiate in this moment light never-ending"
"Towards the future we will engrave evidence that we're not alone"

"Never hesistate
Fight endlessly rewriting your fate!"

"The bruises on your soul will be relieved once you forfeit control
Unleash all your rage"

"Burn up this voice as we cry to the sky
Until we must say goodbye"

"Your time's finally come
Let's dance and rejoice with whole jubilee
Forever you'll shine"

"Your flawless journey through the stars has begun
Now go, this journey of yours will never end"

"The bruises on your soul will be relieved once you forfeit control
Unleash all your rage"

"Burn up this voice as we cry to the sky
Until we must say goodbye"

"Your time's finally come
Let's dance and rejoice with whole jubilee
Forever you'll shine"

"Your flawless journey through the stars has begun
Now go, this journey of yours will never end"
"With grace and pride"
"Song of Battle ~Against Fate~"
"Nadereh"
